attributes.action: Allow learner drivers to access online theory tests during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Learner drivers have lost almost a year of lessons, theory tests and practical tests.  Schools, colleges and universities have enabled systems whereby tests/assessments etc can be done remotely.  The Government needs to put the same measures in place for learner drivers theory tests.
attributes.background: All learner drivers to be able to take their theory tests at home remotely via Internet during lockdown

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make driving theory tests available to take online
